reviewText: This band plays at my church and is the best at jazz. It was great to see them in this DVD. Great product.

Whilst originally looking for material by a UK band of the same name from the 70s I came across this group of musicians on You Tube and was instantly captivated by their particular brand of Jazz.  After searching for some time I managed to track down this Live DVD on Amazon and ordered it.  I can honestly say I have not been disappointed.  These talented musicians are captured beautifully in this excellent live footage and now have a new fan in the UK.  I highly recommend it if you like the band and can find a copy.
